name: Zombie Prison Break
description:
This game has a fun aesthetic along with polished mechanics. Every gun is something unique that you most likely haven't seen in other games. They range from the starter weapon, a blowgun to a potato shotgun, even to a reverse gun. Each gun feels unique and has it's pros and cons. The prison/map has different path options giving good replay-ability.




  • Do you like old school round-based zombie games?
  • Do you like shooters where you can crouch, walk, run, jump, and slide? Me too, that's why I added them to the game.
  • Do you like cool weapons? I don't have any basic weapons like an AR-15 and wait until you get the wonder weapon!
  • Do you like perks? Same, that's why I added six.
  • Do you like replay-ability? It's about as replayable as any round-based zombie game.
